pageProduct.name: Promensil Menopause Double Strength 60 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

Promensil Menopause contains a natural standardised red clover isoflavone which can help relieve hot flushes, night sweats, mild anxiety & moodiness.

What is Promensil Menopause Double Strength for?
  • Helps reduce night sweats and hot flushes
  • Helps relieve menopausal symptoms and symptoms of mild anxiety

Who is Promensil Menopause Double Strength Tabs for?
Women experiencing menopausal symptoms. Promensil is a supplement based on Red Clover isoflavones specifically standardized to help maintain general wellbeing for women during the post-menopause.

When should I take Promensil Menopause Double Strength Tabs?
During post-menopause.

Why should I take Promensil Menopause Double Strength Tabs?
Promensil Menopause Double Strength has twice the amount of isoflavones (derived from Red clover), a unique ingredient of natural standardised red clover isoflavones which can help relieve the symptoms of menopause including night sweats, hot flushes, mild anxiety & moodiness.

Size: 60 Tablets

Warnings

If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. Contains soy.

Ingredients

Dosage Form: Film coated tablet
Quantity: 60 tablets
Active ingredients per tablet: Contains standardised extract equivalent to dried Trifolium pratense herb 5g (equiv. isoflavones 80g)

Active Ingredients: Trifolium pratense (Red Clover) herb ext. dry conc. std. 200 mg equiv. to dry herb 5g (min) equiv. to Isoflavones (of Trifolium pratense) 80 mg per tablet

Directions

1 tablet daily with meal. While individual responses vary, many women will notice difference in symptoms within 3-8 weeks of daily usage.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C in a dry place away from direct sunlight.
